definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: If the electric field added is unchangeable , what produces is the direct current.
sentences.chinese: 如果所加的电场不变，产生的是直流电。

sentences.english: It is obvious th at A. C. motors are superior to D. C. motors in many appli cations.
sentences.chinese: 显然，交流电机在许多应用场合比直流电机优越。

sentences.english: The arc extinguishing principle of miniature circuit breaker in DC circuits was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了小型交流断路器在直流电路中的灭弧原理。

sentences.english: The methods were discussed to design the speed governing system of DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 详细讨论了直流电机调速系统的工程设计方法。

sentences.english: Auto-stop work comes when the major loop exceeds the safety value.
sentences.chinese: 主回路直流电压超过安全值时，自动停止工作。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the theory and measurement of dynamic characteristics of permanent-magnet DC motors.
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论了永磁直流电机的动态特性理论和测量。

sentences.english: This paper proposses a cost-effective software design of BLDCM, and some procedure flow charts of main program subroutine are offered.
sentences.chinese: 详细列出无刷直流电机双闭环控制器软件程序流程图。

sentences.english: Permancet magnet DC motor, 220V, 50Hz, single phase.
sentences.chinese: 永磁直流电机，220伏，50赫兹，单相。

sentences.english: In situations requiring wide range multi-speed DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 在要求宽范围调速的场合多用直流电动机。

sentences.english: This paper intends to make a better on the Design of Brushless DC motor .
sentences.chinese: 本文是对无刷直流电动机做出深入的剖析与设计。

sentences.english: The direct current bridge is a kind of comparing instrument.
sentences.chinese: 直流电桥是一种比较式仪表。

sentences.english: Theory of thulium no-brush DC motor will be research.
sentences.chinese: 了解稀土永磁无刷直流电机的工作原理。

sentences.english: The transmission system is in type of DC motor full-digital speed adjusting.
sentences.chinese: 传动系统采用直流电机全数字式调速。

sentences.english: This thesis research the direct torque control of square-wave brushless DC motor.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究方波无刷直流电机的直接转矩控制。

sentences.english: An installation for transmitting large quantities of electricity at high-voltage D. C. including the converter substations.
sentences.chinese: 包括换流站在内的输送大量高压直流电的设施。

sentences.english: Outputs are protected from short circuits, and operate on 5 or 12 VDC power.
sentences.chinese: 输出受到保护，短路，和操作5或12伏直流电源。

definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
to boost the pressure (of a fluid)/to boost (or step up) the voltage
